text: If there is 0 star rating, will definitely rate them ZERO. Never see so lousy property management service before. The W Residence @ Sentosa Cove managed by their team is expensive yet dirty, messy and lack of efficiency.
Lousy property management service. Delay after delay for trivial reasons. Our service charges are going to waste.

Lousiest management ever. Don’t even consider this company. High turnover.. already saw 3 staff in a span of 8 months. Super lazy, unhelpful and mean. Wouldn’t wish upon any other condo residents the same pain we have to go through having to deal with such a management company.

Since their take over, site staff changed many times. Staff performance is way below par most of time. Stay away from this company. Management is also not dependable. No star, negative star if possible.

Horrible management team. Never engage them if you want to maintain your property at market price. The staff have attitude problem, super super rude and less knowledgeable.  Never clean and maintain the Condon properly. It is quite smelly in the carpark and the lobby area, but management never take any actions. The cleaner even put 2 racks in the condo public area to put  their own belonging. The security never do the job, even many ppl call them to report outside person enter our swimming poll. They never appear. When you call management office, they never pick up the call.
